column5: Gracias!! Qué tarjeta de crédito recomendarías?
Por que es una estafa? Los encontré hace poco. Cuentame please!

Same question here! The only group I know is "Felices y Forrados" who talk about the Chilean pension system. I've been trying to learn how to improve my personal finances as well. I'm currently in LA  and I've been investing my savings here cause since the market is more competitive you have more options to compare where you want to allocate your money. I've found other Chileans talking about personal finances but mostly on YouTube.

Since we're both Chileans maybe we can help each other with some investment suggestions 😉
